# f5xc_ike_phase1_profile (Resource)

Manages a IKEPhase1Profile in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the IKEPhase1Profile.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the IKEPhase1Profile will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the IKEPhase1Profile.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the IKEPhase1Profile.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the IKEPhase1Profile.
